Package utils.database.connection

Interface IDatabaseConnection

All Known Implementing Classes:
InterbankPostgresConnection, PostgresConnection
public interface IDatabaseConnection
The IDatabaseConnection interface defines a contract for managing database connections and performing common database operations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    closeConnection()
    Closes the database connection, releasing associated resources.
    Connection
    getConnection()
    Retrieves a connection to the database.
    ResultSet
    getData(String sqlQuery)
    Executes a SQL query and retrieves the resulting data as a ResultSet.
    int
    insertData(String sqlQuery)
    Executes an SQL query to insert data into the database.
    void
    updateData(String sqlQuery)
    Executes an SQL query to update data in the database.

  • Method Details

    • getConnection

      Connection getConnection()
      Retrieves a connection to the database.
      Returns:
      A Connection object representing the database connection.

    • getData

      ResultSet getData(String sqlQuery)
      Executes a SQL query and retrieves the resulting data as a ResultSet.
      Parameters:
      sqlQuery - The SQL query to execute.
      Returns:
      A ResultSet containing the retrieved data.

    • insertData

      int insertData(String sqlQuery)
      Executes an SQL query to insert data into the database.
      Parameters:
      sqlQuery - The SQL query to execute for insertion.
      Returns:
      The number of rows affected by the insertion.

    • updateData

      void updateData(String sqlQuery)
      Executes an SQL query to update data in the database.
      Parameters:
      sqlQuery - The SQL query to execute for updating.

    • closeConnection

      void closeConnection()
      Closes the database connection, releasing associated resources.
